{{Infobox Berry |name = #53 Roseli |image = [[File:Roseli.png]] |caption = This Berry is sweet with a hint of bitterness and has a lingering sweet scent. The scent of this Berry plant attracts wild Pok√©mon. |growtime = 7h |harvest = 38 berries |replant = 5% |points = 2,500 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *25 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} '''Roseli''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in the [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with at least 1 ripe [[Mago]], at least 1 ripe [[Nanab]], at least 1 ripe [[Magost]] and at least 1 ripe [[Watmel]]. It emits an aura that increases the chance of encountering a wandering Pokemon. {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 40 mins 10 secs || 1 hour 24 mins || 3 hours 30 mins || 7 hours - 14 hours |- ! Animation |
